problem_text_cn: 如图,一根长25m梯子,斜立在一竖直的墙上,这时梯足距墙底端7m,如果梯子的顶端下滑4m,那么梯足将滑动()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a long N_0 ladder stands obliquely on a vertical wall. At this time, the foot of the ladder is N_1 from the bottom of the wall. If the top of the ladder slides by N_2, then the foot of the ladder will slide ()
raw_answer: 解:梯子顶端距离墙角地距离为√{25²-7²}=24(m),顶端下滑后梯子低端距离墙角的距离为√{25²-(24-4)²}=15(m),15m-7m=8m.故选:C.
